Name: Team Size Limit
Description: Team size must not exceed capacity

Name: Skill Certification Required
Description: Employee must have certified skill for task

Name: Employee Availability
Description: Employee must be available during sprint

Name: Task Effort Estimation
Description: Task effort should be within sprint capacity

Name: Sprint Duration Limits
Description: Sprint must start and end within planned dates

Name: Role Assignment Required
Description: Each team must have assigned Scrum Master

Name: Product Backlog Status
Description: Backlog status must be active to contain features

Name: Blocker Severity Limit
Description: Blockers above a certain severity must be resolved immediately

Name: Priority Feature Delivery
Description: High priority features must be included in release plan

Name: Team Location Compatibility
Description: Team members must be located within compatible time zones
